name: Wanyudo Island
description:
Wanyudo Island

Once upon a time there was a village… how long will that last…

 

 

You need to sacrifice from your village or surroundings to ensure your village finds a way out BEFORE THE DEMON AWAKES.

 There are two Easter eggs.

 Point and click with mouse

M: Music

R: Restart

Q: Quit

Numpad +/-: Game speed
